00055 * ILR register definitions
00056 **********************************************************************/
00058 #define RTC_ILR_BITMASK                 ((0x00000003))

00061

00191

00200 /* ---------------- CHECK PARAMETER DEFINITIONS ---------------------------- */
00202 #define PARAM_RTCx(x)   (((uint32_t *)x)==((uint32_t *)LPC_RTC))
00203 
00204 /* Macro check RTC interrupt type */
00205 #define PARAM_RTC_INT(n)        ((n==RTC_INT_COUNTER_INCREASE) || (n==RTC_INT_ALARM))
00206 
00207 /* Macro check RTC time type */
00208 #define PARAM_RTC_TIMETYPE(n)   ((n==RTC_TIMETYPE_SECOND) || (n==RTC_TIMETYPE_MINUTE) \
00209 || (n==RTC_TIMETYPE_HOUR) || (n==RTC_TIMETYPE_DAYOFWEEK) \
00210 || (n==RTC_TIMETYPE_DAYOFMONTH) || (n==RTC_TIMETYPE_DAYOFYEAR) \
00211 || (n==RTC_TIMETYPE_MONTH) || (n==RTC_TIMETYPE_YEAR))
00212 
00213 /* Macro check RTC calibration type */
00214 #define PARAM_RTC_CALIB_DIR(n)  ((n==RTC_CALIB_DIR_FORWARD) || (n==RTC_CALIB_DIR_BACKWARD))
00215 
00216 /* Macro check RTC GPREG type */
00217 #define PARAM_RTC_GPREG_CH(n)   ((n>=0) && (n<=4))
